name: ci-cd-demo
description: Full-stack CI/CD demo with React, Prisma, and Playwright

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=api && npm run build --workspace=web
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=api && npm run test --workspace=web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=api && npm run lint --workspace=web
scripts.clean: rm -rf api/dist api/node_modules web/dist web/node_modules node_modules
